articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded for His Exploits Performed for Liberation of Korea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded for His Exploits Performed for Liberation of Korea
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The exploits Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a peerless patriot and the sun of the nation, performed by liberating the country will always shine along with the history of the nation.  
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, said this when interviewed by KCNA on Monday with the approach of the 68th anniversary of the liberation of Korea. 
					
					 On this significant day Jo Il Min paid the highest tribute to Kim Il Sung, who victoriously led the great anti-Japanese war to liberate Korea. 
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army could win a victory in the war against the Japanese imperialists without state rear or assistance by a regular army thanks to the leadership of Kim Il Sung, Jo said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean nation could demonstrate its dignity all over the world as Kim Il Sung liberated the country. 
					
					 The reverence of the fellow countrymen in the south for him is growing deeper as the days go by. 
					
					 This is a clear manifestation of will of patriotic people to convey the undying exploits of the great man down through generations. 
					
					 It is the great fortune for the Korean nation to have Marshal Kim Jong Un, another brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu and creditable successor to the cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The reunification of Korea is sure to be achieved thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Improving Relations with S. Korea through Dialogue
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Improving Relations with S. Korea through Dialogue
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK remains invariable in its stance to improve the relations with south Korea through dialogue and cooperation, not confrontation, and pave the path for peace and national prosperity, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It continues:
					
					 It is required by the times to turn the inter-Korean ties of distrust and confrontation into those of trust and reconciliation.
					
					 The confrontation between the north and the south of Korea is a product of the policy of aggression pursued by foreign forces.
					
					 The history of the Korean nation's division tells a bitter lesson that such escalated inter-Korean confrontation brings the nation nothing but continued partition and horrible war disaster.
					
					 The DPRK has called for ending the tragedy of national division and achieving the north-south reconciliation and cooperation and has made every possible effort to do so.
					
					 The improved inter-Korean relations are a prerequisite to ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and achieving uniform development and common prosperity of the nation.
					
					 What is urgent for improving these relations is to conduct brisk multi-faceted dialogue, contact, exchange and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 There should be visits, contacts, dialogues and cooperation among Koreans of all social standings in the north and the south and overseas along with authorities-level dialogue.
					
					 Only when the people from all walks of life, the driving force for national reunification movement, take an active part in the work to achieve the unity and reunification of the nation and pool their efforts, wisdom and energy, can the inter-Korean ties turn more dynamic and properly develop in line with the will and desire of all Koreans.
					
					 It is the only way of saving the inter-Korean ties from a collapse to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
					
					 Both declarations serve as reunification programmes common to the nation which all Koreans should thoroughly uphold and implement.
					
					 These declarations comprehensively deal with principles and ways to solve the issues concerning national reunification independently by concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK will as ever make sustained patient efforts to warm the relations with south Korea and achieve the historic cause of national reunification by concerted efforts of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Focusing Efforts on Building Economic Power
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Focusing Efforts on Building Economic Power
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon all the Koreans to carry on the dynamic drive to build an economic power under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea and thus usher in a heyday of a new leap forward and prosperity of Songun Korea.
					 The struggle of the Korean people for building an economic power is making a dynamic and confident advance under the leadership of the great party, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people across the country turned out as one in hearty response to the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and have waged a strenuous drive for building an economic power.
					
					 The service personnel have made a breakthrough in important worksites, determined to successfully take charge of both the defence of the country and socialist construction. Service personnel and people are carrying out joint operations, demonstrating the invincible spirit of Songun Korea in different parts of the country.
					
					 The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum was built as a monumental edifice in the era of Songun, a vast orchard of apple trees appeared at the foot of Chol Pass and modern production bases sprang up to contribute to improving the people's living standard.
					
					 Shining successes have been reported to herald a victory in this year's drive. Many units have been remodeled as required by the new century and an increasing number of people have fulfilled their yearly plans. 
					
					 Success in the building of an economic power is sure to be achieved. 
					
					 We have the Juche-oriented idea and line for building an economic power and tested leadership of the great party as it steers the effort for doing so to victory. The elated mental power of the service personnel and people single-mindedly united around the party and the leader, the solid material and technological foundation built in the course of the protracted historic struggle and models created for building an economic power and a wealth of experience gained under the leadership of the party serve as exceptionally precious assets.
					
					 The editorial calls for dynamically waging drives for victory on all fronts for building an economic power full of firm conviction of bright future and optimism and thus powerfully demonstrating the spirit of the prospering great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating Peaceful Environment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating Peaceful Environment
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Only when the world peace-loving progressive forces turn out as one, is it possible to avert a war and ensure peace in the international arena.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article, and goes on:
					
					 The world where the popular masses' independent desire has fully become a reality is a world free from all sorts of domination and subjugation and a peaceful world without any aggression and war.
					
					 Aggression and war bring unspeakable misfortune, pain, destruction and plunder to people whereas peace guarantees their progress and development.
					
					 Peace, therefore, has become a common desire and the most universal ideal of the people of all countries aspiring after independent life and development.
					
					 The DPRK has made positive efforts to accomplish the cause of peace, the aspiration and desire common to humankind.
					
					 The Korean people have made persistent efforts to lead an independent and creative life in a peaceful environment as required by the present era which is ultra-modernized and highly civilized and where the ideal of humankind is coming true. All of them are waging a tenacious struggle in unity towards a rosy future.
					
					 The DPRK has advanced the most reasonable and constructive proposals for detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula and worked hard to implement them despite the escalated aggression and war moves of the imperialists. The DPRK has never made any concession in the struggle for peace but has positively protected peace.
					
					 Peaceful environment never comes of itself simply because people desire it.
					
					 It can be achieved only through a struggle. The world peace-loving people will surely accomplish the human cause of peace when they courageously turn out in actions, weathering difficulties and ordeals.

articles.title: KCNA Decries Japan's Opinion Poll over Tok Islets
articles.content:
KCNA Decries Japan's Opinion Poll over Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government recently fed the public with the results of national opinion poll to the effect that the majority of those polled contended that Tok islets are territories belonging to Japan.
					 Japan, a country responsible for conflicts with several countries over understanding of history and territorial disputes, again laid claims to the islets that lie in waters off the eastern coast of Korea. This unpardonable territorial ambition has sparked off international criticism.
					
					 Tokyo's territorial claim can never be overlooked as the special opinion poll was conducted by the planning and mediation office for territory and sovereignty under the Cabinet Secretariat to be reflected in the future policies.
					
					 Japan, which is at odds with some neighboring countries over issues of territory and history, has taken particularly brazen-faced and arrogant attitude to the issue of Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of Korea.
					
					 So vaulting is Japan's ambition to make the islets, a huge natural resource pool, its own to use them as a bridgehead for military advance into the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia.
					
					 Tok Islets have been recognized as part of the inalienable territory of Korea from the ancient times and this is grounded on historical facts and law. The Japanese reactionaries, however, conducted the special opinion poll to hedge upon the issue, a height of insanity.
					
					 Can the absurd opinion poll in deception of the people change the main point of the territorial issue?
					
					 Never has there been a time in the past when Tok Islets belonged to Japan.
					
					 But considering the islets important part in the whole chain of realizing their overseas aggression the Japanese reactionaries are making desperate efforts to this end.
					
					 They are distorting history and trying to make it appear that Tok Islets are land usurped by Korea, misleading the public opinion and abetting the seizure of the islets among the Japanese.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the loud claim to the islets has been made on the crest of the trend in Japan that is increasingly lurching to the right.
					
					 Japan's territorial claim cannot but be viewed as a key process in realizing its criminal strategy for reinvasion and its policy for war as it is now looking to revise the pacifist constitution. 
					
					 Japan is not going to give up the islets for their geopolitical advantages.
					
					 What Japan covets as the emerging hotbed of aggression and war is not just Asia but the vast world. 
					
					 Japan's misguided territorial ambition will naturally disturb stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					 It is the 21st century when territorial sovereignty has been taken as an acute political issue related to the sovereignty of nations.
					
					 Japan's ambition will lead it to final international isolation and ruin.

articles.title: S. Korea Hit Hard by Heat Wave
articles.content:
S. Korea Hit Hard by Heat Wave
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- South Korea was hit hard by unabated heat wave, according to CBS of south Korea on Friday.
					 The sweltering heat left several persons dead and caused more than 660 fever cases. Over 786,000 domestic animals including pigs, chickens and ducks died at farmhouses.
					
					 The temperature on railways in North Kyongsang Province rose to over 55 degrees centigrade on Friday, the CBS reported.

articles.title: Deaths by Tick Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deaths by Tick Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Damage caused by tick is on the daily increase in south Korea, according to CBS of south Korea on Saturday.
					 More than ten persons were reported to have died so far in the wake of the recent death of an old person in his 70s due to virus spread by tick in Inchon, the broadcasting service said.

articles.title: Compatriots' Paper in Uzbekistan Observes Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Compatriots' Paper in Uzbekistan Observes Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Thongil, Koreans newspaper in Uzbekistan, carried a special write-up on Aug. 8 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The paper carried a photo of the Arch of Triumph symbolic of the glorious revolutionary history and undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, who accomplished the historic cause of liberating the country.
					
					 The article titled "Day of Korea's liberation" said that August 15 saw the Korean nation's liberation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule. And this historic day is grandly celebrated in Korea.
					
					 The article noted that the President led 20 odd years of the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, achieving the historic cause of liberating Korea.
					
					 It also noted that the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was significantly marked in the DPRK.
					
					 It carried news that overseas compatriots and foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay high tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il while staying in the DPRK on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					 It gave photo-accompanied accounts of grand events held in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un such as the inaugural ceremonies of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, a military parade and Pyongyang mass demonstration.
					
					 It carried news that Kim Jong Un enjoyed the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", a Kim Il Sung Prize winner.
					
					 It also gave an account of the meeting of overseas compatriots held in Moscow to support peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Chilean Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Chilean Political Party
Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) posted an article titled "Kim Il Sung, peerlessly brilliant commander who worked military miracle in the 20th century" on its website on July 25 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The article said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly brilliant commander who worked miracles in the history of modern war by creating an original military strategy which no famous general in the world could ever advance.
					
					 The President turned the unfavorable situation created in the early days of the war into a favorable one in a short span of time, leading the Korean People's Army (KPA) to firmly take the initiative in the war.
					
					 It was thanks to his preeminent strategy that the brave KPA liberated Seoul in just three days after the start of the war.
					
					 The KPA broke through one after another the defence lines set by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces by increasing the speed of advance and thus drove the enemy into a tight corner.
					
					 Miracles and feats of special mention were performed not only in the land but in the sea and air.
					
					 Torpedo boats of the KPA Navy sank the U.S. imperialists' heavy cruiser Baltimore called as a "moving island" in the waters off Jumunjin, and air units of the KPA downed the U.S. imperialists' B-29 strategic bombers.
					
					 The article gave a detailed account of the fact that the President created unique military war methods in the whole period of the war, recording a brilliant chapter in the history of modern war.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism released a statement on August 5 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il in the work on August 4, 1997 formulated the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were adopted. As a result, the Korean people's struggle to carry out the instruction of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification greeted a new turning phase.
					
					 The noble exploits and patriotic idea of Kim Jong Il, who devoted his life to the reunification of the country and nation will shine forever.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism expressed conviction that the Korean people would successfully implement the instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification under the outstanding Songun leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, concluded the article.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee was inaugurated with due ceremony in Lima on August 5 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of political parties, organizations and organs including the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Suk Library, Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship.
					
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland" who is chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a meeting, lecture and film show on the occasion of the birthday of the DPRK, September 9.

articles.title: RPDC tiene posicion de mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
RPDC tiene posicion de mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas con el dialogo y la cooperacion y abrir el camino de la paz y la prosperidad nacional son la invariable posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y continua:
					Sustituir las relaciones intercoreanas de desconfianza y confrontacion por las de la fe y la reconciliacion es la demanda de la epoca actual.
					
					La confrontacion fratricida deviene el fruto de la politica agresiva de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					La historia de la division nacional saca la leccion de que la confrontacion y la agravacion entre el Norte y el Sur traen solo la continuacion de la division y  desastres de la guerra.
					
					En el pasado, la RPDC insistio en eliminar la tragedia de la division nacional y realizar la reconciliacion y la cooperacion con el Sur e hizo todos sus esfuerzos para llevarlo a cabo.
					
					El mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas es la premisa para asegurar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr el desarrollo coherente de la nacion y la prosperidad comun.
					
					Lo imprescindible en esta labor es realizar multilateralmente el dialogo, el contacto, el intercambio y la cooperacion.
					
					Junto con las conversaciones de las autoridades de ambas partes coreanas hay que realizar el viaje reciproco, el contacto, el dialogo y la cooperacion de distintos sectores del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar.
					
					Solo cuando los habitantes de distintos sectores, sujeto del movimiento de la reunificacion de la patria, se unan sus fuerzas,  inteligencias y entusiasmo participando activamente en la labor por la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion, se animaran mas y se desarrollaran correctamente las relaciones intercoreanas conforme a la voluntad y la aspiracion de toda la nacion.
					
					Hay que respetar y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre para salvar las relaciones intercoreanas en catastrofe.
					
					Estas declaraciones siendo el programa comun de reunificacion a ser mantenido y ejecutado cabalmente por la nacion coreana dilucidan generalmente los principios y medios para resolver de modo independiente el asunto de la reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas propias de la nacion coreana.
					
					El Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC se esforzaran en el futuro tambien con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion coreana por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a concentrar fuerzas a construccion de potencia economica
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a concentrar fuerzas a construccion de potencia economica
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- En el editorial divulgado este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun exhorta a dinamizar la campana para la construccion de potencia economica bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y abrir la nueva era de auge y prosperidad de la Corea del Songun.
					Bajo la sabia guia del gran partido, marcha bien ahora la lucha del pueblo coreano por convertir el pais en una potencia economica, senala el rotativo y prosigue:
					
					Los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y otros habitantes de todo el pais se levantaron como un solo hombre para cumplir las tareas indicadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. Los uniformados abrieron brecha en los sectores importantes con la decision de encargarse tanto de la defensa nacional como de la construccion del socialismo y cooperaron activamente con ellos los civiles poniendo de pleno manifiesto el temperamento de la invencible Corea del Songun.
					
					Como resultado, se construyo magnificamente el nuevo Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, se acondiciono una extensa granja fruticola al pie del monte Chol y se levantaron otras bases modernas de produccion que contribuyen mucho a la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Muchas unidades se remodelaron segun requisitos del nuevo siglo y se incremento el numero de los que cumplen los planes anuales de produccion, lo cual vaticina la victoria de la campana de este ano.
					
					Nuestra causa de construccion de potencia economica tiene amplias posibilidades de triunfar.
					
					Nuestro pueblo tiene la autoctona idea y linea para el respecto y cuenta con la probada guia del gran partido que conduce la lucha a la victoria.
					
					Son recursos muy valiosos la elevada fuerza espiritual de los militares y civiles unidos compactamente en torno al partido y al lider, la base material y tecnica consolidada mediante la larga lucha historica, las unidades modelos y abundantes experiencias preparados bajo la guia del partido en la construccion de potencia economica.
					
					Convencidos del futuro maravilloso, tenemos que dar mas acicate a la construccion de potencia economica para demostrar la imagen de la potencia del monte Paektu en prosperidad.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia ambicion territorial de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia ambicion territorial de Japon
Pyongyang, 12 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el gobierno japones publico el llamado "resultado de la encuesta nacional", segun el cual la mayoria de los interrogados respondio a favor de la pertenencia del islote Tok al territorio japones.
					 El pais isleno tiene disputas con otros paises por la mala interpretacion de la historia y litigio territorial.
					
					Sin embargo, volvio a publicar ese resultado de encuesta con el fin de justificar su ambicion de arrebatar territorio ajeno, lo cual produce criticas de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Ese sondeo especial resulta mas peligroso si se toma en cuenta que la "oficina de planificacion y medidas del territorio y soberania" del secretariado del gabinete japones lo realizo con la decision de reflejar su resultado en la futura politica.
					
					  Japon asume una actitud mas descarada y arrogante en el problema del islote Tok, territorio propio de Corea.
					
					  Es insaciable la ambicion de Japon de apoderarse del islote Tok para usarlo como cabeza de puente para el avance militar a la Peninsula Coreana y Asia y explotar muchos recursos naturales existentes ahi.
					
					  Es absurdo que los reaccionarios japoneses hayan realizado hasta la encuesta especial sobre susodicho islote sin reconocer que este devino desde hace mucho tiempo una parte del sagrado territorio de Corea tanto en vista de la historia como en el sentido juridico.
					
					  Desde la antiguedad, el islote Tok no ha sido nunca territorio japones.
					
					 Sin embargo, inyectan en los japoneses la idea de usurpar el islote Tok tergiversando los hechos historicos como si alguien se lo hubiera despojado.
					
					  El criterio de la "soberania sobre el islote Tok" se hace mas grave aprovechando la corriente de derechizacion que se torna abierta en estos dias en la sociedad japonesa.
					
					  Ese criterio, que tiene la prioridad de enmendar la "Constitucion pacifica", deviene uno de los procesos principales para realizar su criminal estrategia de agredir de nuevo a ultramar.
					
					  Japon no quiere abandonar su ambicion de usurpar el islote Tok ya que este ocupa una importante posicion geopolitica.
					
					  Ese pais, que se rehabilita como foco de agresion y guerra, coloca en su mira no solo Asia sino que tambien el resto del mundo.
					
					  La ambicion territorial de Japon crea el obstaculo en la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					  Ahora estamos en el silgo XXI y Japon esta equivocado.
					
					  El problema de soberania territorial es delicado asunto politico relacionado con la soberania nacional.
					
					  La ambicion territorial llevara al pais isleno al aislamiento internacional y arruinamiento total.
